pages.text: Flux blocks are used in many different crafting recipes for the mod. Use JEI to see recipes. They are needed for some of the later crafting recipes. It takes great *power* to draw these out from the quantum void!

Use the $(l:flux/synthesizer)Synthesizer$(/l) along with a $(l:io/linker)Linker$(/l) and either diamond or netherite to produce large quantities. Use Eye of Ender and Coal to produce your first Flux Dust (this is gonna take awhile...)
